content: with this pattern you will be able to make as many baby octopi as you would like this is the perfect project for beginner crocheters you will receive two pdf english & french difficulty beginner skills required crocheting in spiral magic_ring chain slip_stitch single_crochet stitch increasing and decreasing materials - about 13g of #6 bulky yarn weight you can use any yarn for this project suggested yarns parfait chunky honey bunny baby snuggle himalayan dolphin paintbox chenille etc - 4mm crochet hook - 12mm safety eyes - polyester fiberfill for stuffing - yarn needle scissors stitch markers - optional strand of pink yarn for the cheeks final size they are about 5 cm 2 high when made with indicated yarn copyright © 2024 content of this document may not be copied reproduced altered published or distributed in any way you may sell finished products made with this pattern provided credit to all from jade
